divs: Sighting DetailsAround 7:50 PM in Carroll County, MD. 4 single spherical lights (SUV sized), a little less than a mile away flying together in sideways V-shape. One by one they went in different directions, disappearing abruptly about 10 seconds after each respective initial departure from the group. Silent, whereas we would be able to hear any helicopter or plane at such a close distance. Weiiird.
Summary: ARound 7:50 P 4 single spherical lights SUV size a mile away flying together in sideways V-shape
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mt Airy
This sighting has never been favorited.
